Overview



The Evaluation Scientist II position represents an exciting opportunity for an experienced scientist to perform evaluation of novel technologies utilizing analytical and preparative LC and LC/MS applications. The candidate will work closely with R&D organizations to support evaluation projects to enhance Waters position in a highly dynamic market.




Responsibilities



Develop and formulate test strategies.Analyze requirement and specification documents to develop and execute test cases.Set up, operate, maintain, troubleshoot and conduct qualification of UPLC, LC, SFC and LC/MS instrumentation.Maintain records and documentation of evaluation activities, provide required reports.Present scientific material at internal meetings when appropriate.




Qualifications



 Bachelor's or Master's Degree in analytical chemistry or related discipline. Minimum 5+ years experience in the pharmaceutical or biotechnology industry in the development of chromatographic separationsExperience in method development is highly desirable.Expertise in various types of separations techniques for small molecules, peptides, proteins (ie: HPLC, UPLC, SFC etc.)Proficiency in LC/MS techniques is highly desirableExcellent documentation and communication skills are required.Ability to work on multiple tasks and projects.Familiarity with Waters products and/or software is highly desirable 




Company Description



Waters Corporation (NYSE: WAT), the world's leading specialty measurement company, has pioneered chromatography, mass spectrometry and thermal analysis innovations serving the life, materials, and food sciences for more than 60 years. With more than 7,000 employees worldwide, Waters operates directly in 35 countries, including 15 manufacturing facilities, with products available in more than 100 countries. Our team focuses on creating business advantages for laboratory-dependent organizations to enable significant advancement in healthcare delivery, environmental management, food safety, and water quality.    Working at Waters enables our employees to unlock the potential of their careers.
